channel.title: Def req for Vesta,Statius, Morrigans, Zuriel
channel.description: How do I add a defence req for Statius, Vesta and Morrigan & Zuriel on a delta server?

item.title: Def req for Vesta,Statius, Morrigans, Zuriel
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

if (ItemID == ####) && playerlevel[1] > ##)) <----1 might not be your defence playerlevel.
return true;
else
return false;
}

Thats not actually the command but thats the theory. Try looking for something similar in your client.java =]

Read full topic
item.source: Def req for Vesta,Statius, Morrigans, Zuriel
